name: How Positive - NOKIA 3310 Jam
description:
(SPACE to switch between +/-, AD and left/right arrow to move, W and up arrow to jump, R to retry)

Hello there, this is a tiny puzzle game that I made for the NOKIA 3310 Jam 3. This is the first time that I've participated in a game jam on itch.io. I had quite some fun. And I also learned some stuff. 

First, making fun puzzle game is hard.

Second, making fun puzzle game is really hard.

Switching between positive and negative as a magnet boi is not entirely on/off I know, but I thought it could be fun. Well, that's about it. Hope you had some fun with the game.

Credits:

Sound pack by @Trixelized

Font pack by Eeve Somepx @somepx

Thanks so much for the resources, total champs!

(Made with Godot 3.2.3)
